name: Motivated To Grow
description:
Despite the chaotic weather, a strange plant is motivated to grow. The plant needs its soil in healthy condition until it can grow. Too much sun light will dry up the soil and kill the plant. Too much water will make the soil damp and eventually kill the plant. Your goal is to place the plant in the weather where the soil needs it, and keep the health of the soil in balance between wetness and dryness within two minutes.

Watchout for tornadoes! It can drag you to the corner. While being dragged by tornado, you cannot pick up or drop the plant.
Watchout for thunders! It can stun you for a short duration. When you are struck by thunder, you also drop the plant.

Controls:
- Move with LEFT & RIGHT arrow keys.
- Jump with UP arrow key.
- Pick up or drop with SPACEBAR.
